actions.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Mathias. With written report No. 97-167.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 230.

official_title: An original resolution to establish within the Office of the Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate a Senate Placement Office.

summary.text: Establishes a Senate Placement Office within the Office of the Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate. Makes it the function of such Office to provide pertinent information regarding individuals seeking employment to appropriate Senate personnel.

titles.title: An original resolution to establish within the Office of the Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate a Senate Placement Office.
